channel.title: iHaxx Server - Version 2.1.0 - Full
channel.description:
[center][b][img]http://ihaxx.net/images/styles/ambient-lightingv4-gold/images/logo.png[/img]
Hello MoparScape,
Some users here may remember me back in 2007, most people here probably don't know me as i havn't been active in the community for a long while now, Over the past couple of weeks i've been starting the development to my Version 2.1.0. Anyways i'm gunna cut straight to the point rather than explain a life story.
Update Log: Update Server Login sendMapRegion Player rendering and update masks Multiplayer support Chat Quest-Handling System walking Finished Ground Item systems Finished Skill Handler Action Queuing system Item Equipping Finished Ground Item System Item on Item completed Object Spawning NPC spawning Npc Transform mask Emotes tab works Skill Menus Saving accounts Music by region Misc Sounds Finished Player Messaging Herblore
Pics - [img]http://ihaxx.net/welcome.png[/img]
[img]http://ihaxx.net/Advertise/StrengthEmote.png[/img]
[img]http://ihaxx.net/Offense.png[/img]
[img]http://ihaxx.net/Loading%20Bar.png[/img]
[img]http://ihaxx.net/Login%20Box.png[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2ccxf7d.gif[/img]
[img]http://ihaxx.net/Advertise/Rushing.png[/img]
[img]http://ihaxx.net/Advertise/SaradominGWD.png[/img]
Many More Pictures To Come So Please Be Patient!
[/b][/center]

item.title: iHaxx Server - Version 2.1.0 - Full
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Nice name choice. Goes well with the virus you’ve put in it.

Read full topic
